control.description-key: Enables you to embed a map of the world with a daylight/night-time overlay.

property.name: controlsPosition
property.description-key: The position of the control on the map.

property.name: controlsScale
property.description-key: Takes a value between 0 and 1, scales the size of the controls box.

property.name: font
property.description-key: Standard CSS string; you need to make the font available within your CSS setup.

property.name: fontSize
property.description-key: By default, this property has value 0, which causes the library to automatically scale your text based upon the width of the container. You can override this scaling-font size by an absolute value.

property.name: isSunshineDisplayed
property.description-key: Controls whether or not to display a radial gradient to mimic the sunshine on the earths surface. Default is true.

property.name: refresh
property.description-key: Setting this value to true will refresh the map.
